expertise.title: Security First
expertise.description: Implementing robust security measures including XSS protection, CSRF tokens, and CSP headers.

expertise.title: Compliance Ready
expertise.description: GDPR, HIPAA, PCI-DSS compliant solutions ensuring your business meets regulatory requirements.

expertise.title: Modern Stack
expertise.description: Leveraging latest technologies and best practices for optimal performance and maintainability.

expertise.title: Performance Optimized
expertise.description: Fast, responsive applications with optimized assets and efficient code architecture.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Web Security Partner
about.introduction: I'm a passionate Web Security Architect and Developer with over 15 years of experience in building secure, scalable, and compliant web applications. My expertise spans across full-stack development, cybersecurity, and regulatory compliance.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.content: Started as a junior developer in 2008, I quickly developed a passion for security and compliance. Over the years, I've worked with Fortune 500 companies, startups, and government agencies, helping them build secure digital solutions. My work has protected millions of users' data and helped organizations achieve compliance with major regulatory standards.

drive.title: What Drives Me
drive.content: In an era where data breaches make headlines daily, I believe that security should never be an afterthought. My mission is to help businesses build trust with their users through robust security practices and transparent compliance measures. Every line of code I write is guided by the principle: 'Security by Design, Privacy by Default.'

sal_framework.title: SAL Framework
sal_framework.subtitle: Security, Accessibility, Longevity
sal_framework.description: My proprietary development approach that ensures every project is:

pillars.description: Built with security best practices from day one
Inclusive design that works for everyone
Maintainable, scalable solutions that grow with you

services.title: Web Security Audits
services.shortDescription: Comprehensive security assessments to identify and fix vulnerabilities.
services.fullDescription: In-depth security audits covering OWASP Top 10, vulnerability scanning, penetration testing, and detailed remediation guidance. Includes code review, configuration analysis, and compliance checking.

services.title: Compliance Consulting
services.shortDescription: Expert guidance for GDPR, HIPAA, PCI-DSS, and other regulatory compliance.
services.fullDescription: Navigate complex regulatory requirements with confidence. I provide comprehensive compliance consulting, gap analysis, implementation guidance, and ongoing support to ensure your organization meets all regulatory obligations.

services.title: Secure Web Development
services.shortDescription: Custom web applications built with security and compliance at the core.
services.fullDescription: Full-stack web development services with security baked in from the start. From simple websites to complex web applications, every project follows security best practices and coding standards.

services.title: DevSecOps Implementation
services.shortDescription: Integrate security into your development pipeline for continuous protection.
services.fullDescription: Implement DevSecOps practices to automate security testing and ensure every code change is secure. I'll help you set up CI/CD pipelines with integrated security tools, vulnerability scanning, and automated compliance checks.
features: CI/CD pipeline setup with security integration

services.title: Security Training
services.shortDescription: Empower your team with security awareness and secure coding practices.
services.fullDescription: Comprehensive security training programs tailored to your team's needs. From general security awareness to advanced secure coding techniques, I provide hands-on training that makes a real difference.

services.title: Technical Consultation
services.shortDescription: Expert advice on architecture, security, and technology decisions.
services.fullDescription: Get expert guidance on technical decisions, architecture design, technology selection, and security strategy. Available for one-time consultations or ongoing advisory relationships.

portfolio.title: Healthcare Portal - HIPAA Compliant
portfolio.description: Developed a secure patient portal for a healthcare provider, ensuring full HIPAA compliance with encrypted data storage, secure messaging, and audit logging.

portfolio.title: E-Commerce Platform - PCI-DSS
portfolio.description: Built a secure e-commerce platform with PCI-DSS compliant payment processing, fraud detection, and secure checkout flow.

portfolio.title: Financial Dashboard - SOC 2
portfolio.description: Created a financial analytics dashboard with SOC 2 compliance, real-time data processing, and comprehensive security controls.
highlights: Advanced encryption at rest and in transit

portfolio.title: Enterprise GDPR Suite
portfolio.description: Developed a comprehensive GDPR compliance suite for enterprise clients, including data mapping, consent management, and privacy dashboards.

portfolio.title: API Security Gateway
portfolio.description: Built a secure API gateway with rate limiting, authentication, encryption, and comprehensive security monitoring for microservices architecture.

portfolio.title: Educational Platform
portfolio.description: Developed a secure online learning platform with user authentication, content management, and protected course materials.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's Build Something Secure Together
contact.description: Have a project in mind? Need security consulting? I'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form below and I'll get back to you within 24 hours.
